Characters owned by Marvel Comics. Copyrights and whatnot.

Choose one of the girls of Iron Man whose feet you like. And note that all of the characters in this story are at least 18 for obvious reasons.
RULES:
1.) No guy feet
2.) No shrinking
3.) No deaths
4.) No ending chapters.
